Package org.openhab.core.config.core

Class ConfigDescriptionBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openhab.core.config.core.ConfigDescriptionBuilder
  • @NonNullByDefault
public class ConfigDescriptionBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    The ConfigDescriptionBuilder class provides a builder for the ConfigDescription class.
    Author:
    Christoph Weitkamp - Initial contribution

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      ConfigDescription build()
      Builds a ConfigDescription with the settings of this builder.

      Adds a list of ConfigDescriptionParameterGroup associated with the ConfigDescriptionParameters.

      • build

        public ConfigDescription build()
                        throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Builds a ConfigDescription with the settings of this builder.
        Returns:

        Throws:
